channel.title: Xteleto command not working!
channel.description: whenever i use xteleto and xteletome they dont work!!!! it says name not found plz help!!

item.title: Xteleto command not working!
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

Obviously your code has thrown exception as it is sending you a String within the catch block.
Print the stack trace of the error and post it.

Read full topic

item.title: Xteleto command not working!
item.dc:creator: @X-J-K-X X-J-K-X
item.description:
@X-J-K-X wrote:

Gosh just use this-.-…

if (command.startsWith(“xteletome”) && (playerRights == 2))
{
try{
String otherPName = command.substring(10);
int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);
if(otherPIndex != -1) {
client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];
p.teleportToX = absX+1;
p.teleportToY = absY;
p.heightLevel = heightLevel;
p.updateRequired = true;
p.sendMessage("You have been teleported to "+playerName);
}
}
catch(Exception e) {
sendMessage(“Invalid. Player doesn’t exist or not online.”);
}
}
else if (command.startsWith(“xteleto”) && (playerRights == 2))
{
try{
String otherPName = command.substring(8);
int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);
if(otherPIndex != -1)
{
client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];
teleportToX = p.absX+1;
teleportToY = p.absY;
heightLevel = p.heightLevel;
updateRequired = true;
sendMessage("Teleto: You teleport to "+p.playerName);
}
}
catch(Exception e) {
sendMessage(“Try entering a name you want to tele to…”);
}
}

Read full topic

item.title: Xteleto command not working!
item.dc:creator: @lov3_rs_money lov3_rs_money
item.description:
@lov3_rs_money wrote:

make sure you’re command is same as mine as mine works right

if (command.startsWith("xteletome") && (playerRights == 2))
	{
		try{
		String otherPName = command.substring(10);
		int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);
		if(otherPIndex != -1) {
			client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];
			p.teleportToX = absX;
			p.teleportToY = absY;
			p.heightLevel = heightLevel;
			p.updateRequired = true;
		//	PlayerHandler.messageToAdmins = "Teleto: "+playerName+" has teleported "+p.playerName+ "to them";
			p.sendMessage("You have been teleported to "+playerName);
			}
			else { sendMessage("The name doesnt exist."); }
		}
			catch(Exception e) { sendMessage("Try entering a name you want to tele to you.."); }
	}
else if (command.startsWith("xteleto") && (playerRights == 2))
	{
		try{
		String otherPName = command.substring(8);
		int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);
		if(otherPIndex != -1)
			{
			client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];
			teleportToX = p.absX;
			teleportToY = p.absY;
			heightLevel = p.heightLevel;
			updateRequired = true;
		//	PlayerHandler.messageToAdmins = "Teleto: "+playerName+" has teleported to "+p.playerName;
			sendMessage("Teleto: You teleport to "+p.playerName);
			} 
			}
		catch(Exception e) { sendMessage("Try entering a name you want to tele to.."); }

	}

hope it helps!

lov3_rs_money

Read full topic

item.title: Xteleto command not working!

item.description:
@Zombiedevice wrote:

THE NAME ISN’T FOUND… THAT SHOULD GIVE A HINT… lol, or you don’t have the command. Also, make sure you type like this ::xteletome (playername) without the parenthesis. (type in right case… like Zaafz Could be a different then ZaaFZ

Zombiedevice hoped this helped!
